last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye to Bloo
last_episode_to_air.overview: The friends plan a perfect day for Mac, whom they believe is moving away.

name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends
overview: Children who create imaginary friends usually take care of them until they are 7-8 years old. Imaginary friends, left on their own after this event, continue to live in this home founded by old Madam Foster.

episodes.name: House of Bloo's (1)
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo meet residents Eduardo, Wilt and Coco, and the home's staff.

episodes.name: House of Bloo's (2)
episodes.overview: An evil imaginary friend sets a sinister plot in motion against Bloo, and Mac and the home's residents must save him.

episodes.name: House of Bloo's (3)
episodes.overview: Mac races to save Bloo from the sinister scheme of the evil imaginary friend.

episodes.name: Store Wars
episodes.overview: Frankie goes to the mall to get a gift for Madame Foster's birthday, but Bloo and the gang tag along and cause all kinds of trouble.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Scribbles
episodes.overview: Bloo decides to open the one door at the retirement home for imaginary friends that is never, ever to be opened, and the house becomes infested with something bad.

episodes.name: Busted
episodes.overview: Bloo breaks Madame Foster's bust, and the gang rushes to put it back together before Mr. Herriman finds out.

episodes.name: Dinner is Swerved
episodes.overview: Bloo can't find the dining room, and Mr. Herriman won't allow dinner to be served until he arrives.

episodes.name: World Wide Wabbit
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo get embarrassing footage of Mr. Herriman while conducting interviews for a Web site.

episodes.name: Berry Scary
episodes.overview: A new Imaginary Friend named Berry has her eyes on Bloo, and Mac stands between them.

episodes.name: Seeing Red / Phone Home
episodes.overview: Terrence creates an imaginary friend named Red to beat up Bloo. Then a man in a cellphone costume fools Bloo.

episodes.name: Who Let the Dogs In?
episodes.overview: Eduardo breaks the "no dogs in the house" rule.

episodes.name: Adoptcalypse Now
episodes.overview: It's "Adopt-a-Thought Saturday," when imaginary friends can be taken by new families. Mac and Bloo worry that they'll lose all their pals, and take drastic measures to make sure they don't.

episodes.name: Bloooo
episodes.overview: Wilt and Eduardo think there's a ghost in the home.

episodes.name: Partying is Such Sweet Soiree
episodes.overview: Mac tries to thwart Bloo's plans for a party.

episodes.name: The Big Lablooski
episodes.overview: Mac gets the gang to join a bowling team, but ends up getting booted off.

episodes.name: Where There's a Wilt There's a Way / Everyone Knows It's Bendy
episodes.overview: Wilt wants to watch basketball on TV, but the others don't. Then a new Imaginary Friend misbehaves at the house and everyone else gets blamed.

episodes.name: Sight for Sore Eyes / Bloo's Brothers
episodes.overview: A Seeing Eye Friend loses his blind kid, and the gang helps find him. Then Boo becomes popular among Mac's classmates, who imagine their own versions of Boo.

episodes.name: Cookie Dough
episodes.overview: The home needs a new roof, so Bloo tries to fund it with a cookie drive.

episodes.name: Frankie My Dear
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo fall for Frankie and become wildly jealous of each other and everyone else.

episodes.name: Mac Daddy
episodes.overview: When Mac accidentally imagines another friend, Bloo suffers sibling rivalry with the newly arrived and very odd Cheese.

episodes.name: Squeakerboxxx
episodes.overview: Bloo breaks a prize squeaking rubber elephant.

episodes.name: Beat with a Schtick
episodes.overview: Bloo is challenged to a fight at the end of the day, but he would rather avoid it.

episodes.name: Sweet Stench of Success
episodes.overview: Bloo becomes a celebrity as a deodorant mascot, but fame taints his relationship with Mac.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Nerdy
episodes.overview: Bloo tries to make Mac cool, and succeeds all to well.

episodes.name: Bloo Done It
episodes.overview: Bloo is suspicious of an old "Friend" of the house, Uncle Pockets, who returns after a long absence.

episodes.name: My So-Called Wife
episodes.overview: A case of mistaken identity sends Coco and Herriman to a high-society gala.

episodes.name: Eddie Monster
episodes.overview: Eduardo runs away from the Home to prove his bravery, but ends up over his head in a fight.

episodes.name: Hiccy-Burp
episodes.overview: Bloo gets a nasty case of the hiccups and must get rid of them before the big Imaginary Friend Pageant.

episodes.name: Camp Keep a Good Mac Down
episodes.overview: A camping trip becomes a problem when Bloo eats all the food.

episodes.name: Imposter's Home for Um...Make 'Em Up Pals
episodes.overview: A suspicious imaginary friend shows up at the house, and Frankie is out to prove him a fraud.

episodes.name: Duchess of Wails
episodes.overview: The Duchess is adopted by Mac's neighbors, and the Foster's don't want to take her back.

episodes.name: Foster's Goes to Europe
episodes.overview: Mac and the crew win a trip to Europe.

episodes.name: Go Goo Go
episodes.overview: The house is filling up with imaginary friends, thanks to a girl named Goo.

episodes.name: Crime After Crime
episodes.overview: Mr. Herriman tries to conceal his carrot addiction, which causes a lot of trouble at Foster's.

episodes.name: Land of the Flea
episodes.overview: Although Eduardo is infested with fleas, he soon befriends them, but Frankie and Mr. Herriman want to get rid of them.

episodes.name: A Lost Claus
episodes.overview: Mac starts to doubt Santa's existence when a hoard of imaginary Santas appear. Bloo sets out to prove that he's real.

episodes.name: One False Movie
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo collaborate on a movie, which turns into a hit. Later, they must make an even better sequel for a film contest.

episodes.name: Setting a President
episodes.overview: Frankie faces a tough campaign against Mr. Herriman as they both compete to be president of Foster's.

episodes.name: Room with a Feud
episodes.overview: A single room opens up in the house, prompting Eduardo, Bloo and Coco to compete for it.

episodes.name: Cuckoo for Coco Cards
episodes.overview: Everyone becomes obsessed with card collection when Coco lays magical eggs filled with cards.

episodes.name: Challenge of the Superfriends
episodes.overview: Bloo gets jealous when Mac is chosen to be the sidekick of an imaginary superhero friend.

episodes.name: The Big Picture
episodes.overview: As everyone gets ready to take the annual house photo, Mac and Bloo notice another picture that was taken years ago.

episodes.name: Squeeze the Day
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo have a fun day by themselves in the mansion.

episodes.name: Neighbor Pains
episodes.overview: Bloo is teased by a child who lives across the street.

episodes.name: Infernal Slumber
episodes.overview: Mac is surprised when Bloo and the rest of the gang show up at his place for a slumber party.

episodes.name: I Only Have Surprise for You
episodes.overview: Mac doesn't want a surprise party.

episodes.name: Bus the Two of Us
episodes.overview: Bloo takes Mac for a secret ride on the Foster's bus.

episodes.name: The Big Cheese
episodes.overview: Everyone gets locked out of the home, and only Cheese knows the code to get back in.

episodes.name: Bloo's the Boss
episodes.overview: Bloo wants to open his own home for imaginary friends when he feels dejected.

episodes.name: Emancipation Complication
episodes.overview: Chaos ensues when a new imaginary friend is created to cheat on a history test.

episodes.name: Make-Believe it or Not!
episodes.overview: Mac and Bloo are imprisoned by evil characters unwittingly created by Goo in her sleep.

episodes.name: Good Wilt Hunting (1)
episodes.overview: Wilt runs away in search of his creator after he receives no visitors at the annual picnic, so Bloo and the gang head out to find him and discover some interesting things about Wilt's secret past along the way.

episodes.name: Good Wilt Hunting (2)
episodes.overview: Wilt runs away in search of his creator after he receives no visitors at the annual picnic, so Bloo and the gang head out to find him and discover some interesting things about Wilt's secret past along the way.

episodes.name: Cheese A Go-Go
episodes.overview: Bloo sees a sci-fi movie about extraterrestrials that look like Cheese, so he thinks that Cheese is a brain-sucking alien.

episodes.name: The Buck Swaps Here
episodes.overview: Eduardo finds a $100 bill on the ground at a swap meet, which triggers greed at the Foster house.

episodes.name: Say It Isn't Sew
episodes.overview: Bloo's plan to hurry to the county fair backfires when a shortcut with Madame Foster turns into a trip to the fabric store.

episodes.name: Something Old, Something Bloo
episodes.overview: Bloo decides to move into a nursing home after an enjoyable visit there.

episodes.name: The Bloo Superdude and the Magic Potato of Power
episodes.overview: Bloo entertains Mac with an action-packed story.

episodes.name: Schlock Star
episodes.overview: Bloo creates the greatest rock act ever when some Imaginary Friends start a garage band and won't let him in.

episodes.name: The Bride to Beat
episodes.overview: Bloo wants to grow up because he thinks Mac is engaged.

episodes.name: Affair Weather Friends
episodes.overview: Bloo feels torn between Mac and a new student, who is the heir to a paddleball franchise.

episodes.name: Ticket to Rod
episodes.overview: Tickets won in a radio contest cause a rift between Mac, Bloo and Frankie.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Wilson Way
episodes.overview: A prank gone wrong has Bloo trying to outrun an army of zombies.

episodes.name: Better Off Ed
episodes.overview: Eduardo must cover his tracks after telling the nursery residents fibs that could catch up to him.

episodes.name: The Little Peas
episodes.overview: The gang gets locked out of the house by a new security system, so Peas must discover how to open the door.

episodes.name: Let Your Hare Down
episodes.overview: A plan to mellow out Mr. Herriman backfires when conditions at the house quickly deteriorate.

episodes.name: Jackie Khones and the Case of the Overdue Library Crook
episodes.overview: Mac discovers that an impostor has been checking out library books in his name and hires a detective to find the crook.

episodes.name: Mondo Coco
episodes.overview: Coco escapes from Foster's and has a wild adventure.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothing
episodes.overview: The Friends start a prank war while staying at a hotel.

episodes.name: Bloo Tube
episodes.overview: The gang posts videos on the Internet after a field trip is rained out.

episodes.name: Race for Your Life, Mac and Bloo
episodes.overview: Bloo and Mac compete in a 30-mile race.

episodes.name: Destination: Imagination (1)
episodes.overview: Frankie is tired of working without being thanked. One day, a toy box is discovered at Foster's front door. Frankie is ordered to take it to the attic and leave it alone, but she knows there is an imaginary friend trapped inside, and opens the box to find it. When she looks inside, she falls into a strange imaginary world. There, she gets treated like a princess by a mysterious imaginary friend. After tackling certain bizarre toy box trials and tribulations, Bloo, Mac, Wilt, Eduardo, and Coco discover Frankie's whereabouts and set out to rescue her from this strange world. This is the first and only episode to have a TV-PG rating.

episodes.name: Destination: Imagination (2)
episodes.overview: Frankie is tired of working without being thanked. One day, a toy box is discovered at Foster's front door. Frankie is ordered to take it to the attic and leave it alone, but she knows there is an imaginary friend trapped inside, and opens the box to find it. When she looks inside, she falls into a strange imaginary world. There, she gets treated like a princess by a mysterious imaginary friend. After tackling certain bizarre toy box trials and tribulations, Bloo, Mac, Wilt, Eduardo, and Coco discover Frankie's whereabouts and set out to rescue her from this strange world. This is the first and only episode to have a TV-PG rating.

episodes.name: Destination: Imagination (3)
episodes.overview: Frankie is tired of working without being thanked. One day, a toy box is discovered at Foster's front door. Frankie is ordered to take it to the attic and leave it alone, but she knows there is an imaginary friend trapped inside, and opens the box to find it. When she looks inside, she falls into a strange imaginary world. There, she gets treated like a princess by a mysterious imaginary friend. After tackling certain bizarre toy box trials and tribulations, Bloo, Mac, Wilt, Eduardo, and Coco discover Frankie's whereabouts and set out to rescue her from this strange world. This is the first and only episode to have a TV-PG rating.

episodes.name: The Bloo Superdude and the Great Creator of Everything's Awesome Ceremony of Fun That He's Not Invited To
episodes.overview: A deliriously ill Bloo attends Mac's birthday party and daydreams about his adventures as a superhero.

episodes.name: Bad Dare Day
episodes.overview: The friends have a house-wide dare competition that quickly gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Read 'Em and Weep
episodes.overview: Recently adopted friends write worrisome letters describing life outside Foster's walls.

episodes.name: Fools and Regulations
episodes.overview: Frankie and Mr. Herriman host a party at Foster's and ask the friends to stay outside or upstairs.

episodes.name: Goodbye to Bloo
episodes.overview: The friends plan a perfect day for Mac, whom they believe is moving away.
